page.title: 11MY NEW HOUSE IN HOOK
page.content: My name is Fiona and I am new to Hook, having lived on the Martin Grant Estate for just a year.The roads are cul-de-sacs and are all still uneven and unsurfaced. The builders say they are going to finish them when the whole estate is complete.So in summer they are dusty and in winter muddy.At the entrance is a showhouse with nice furniture in it.My house has 3 toilets 2 bathrooms 4 bedrooms 2 garages study with computer and utility room.The smallest bedroom is used as a TV room and for playing games on my computer. Our bedrooms are all fitted with lots of cupboards-my brother Alistair even has them under his bed.Our house would cost about Â£80000 to buy now,when we moved in it was only Â£65000 but, of course, we have planted the garden with lots of shrubs and a lawn so that it is very attractive.
